snippet: The dovish lobbying group J Street, which has occasionally criticized the Israeli government, was denied membership in an influential national umbrella organization.
abstract: Conference of Presidents of Major American Jewish Organizations votes to deny membership to to lobbying group J Street, which has at times criticized Israeli government; decision is closely watched, coming as many Jewish institutions face controversies over how much debate over Israel they are willing to tolerate.
lead_paragraph: The dovish lobbying group J Street, which has occasionally criticized the Israeli government, was denied membership in an influential national umbrella organization.

headline.main: Jewish Coalition Rejects Lobbying Group’s Bid to Join
headline.print_headline: Jewish Coalition Rejects Lobbying Group’s Bid to Join

keywords.value: Conference of Presidents of Major American Jewish Organizations
keywords.name: organizations
